responsibilities: Build, maintain, and scale the systems that deliver hundreds of millions of data points daily
Architect resilient distributed systems to power near-realtime personalization and analytics
Push existing platform tooling towards self-service and improve the user experience of technology
Implement Privacy by Design at the entry points of the data ecosystem to protect data
Develop and launch efficient and reliable data pipelines to ingest and transform data
Deploy inclusive data quality checks to ensure quality and timeliness of data, and diagnose/fix issues to ensure SLAs
Collaborate with product manager, product engineers, data owners, data stewards, and customers to implement and maintain data products for analytics, ML, and reporting needs
Work with other engineers to improve reliability, documentation, and automation to simplify self-service support for datasets
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building, maintaining, and scaling data systems, developing data pipelines, and ensuring data quality. There is no mention of tasks related to training or fine-tuning language models, which is a specialized task in the field of machine learning and natural language processing. The responsibilities are more aligned with data engineering rather than model training or customization.
